about_the_game:
Build Your Own Cat Home! Love cats? How about chaos, strategy, and cuteness? Then this game is perfect for you! Manage your own cat business, create wonders with your uniquely talented feline friends, and earn money while doing it.

Build Your Deck Strategically to Increase Daily Income

Key Features:

  • Unique Cats: Each cat comes with different abilities and stories to tell

  • Race Against Time: Don't forget to pay the rent while growing your business

  • Strategic Combinations: Create powerful synergies between different cat types

DIVERSE CAT COMBINATIONS

EXTRAORDINARY CAT BREEDS WITH DISTINCT ABILITIES Some cats can engage in playful battles, while others can have kittens. Each cat brings their own special traits to your growing empire!

Use Your Space and Cards Wisely One wrong move and you and your furry friends might end up on the street! Plan your strategy carefully to keep your cat paradise thriving.

FEATURES:

  • Dynamic Management System

  • Multiple Shop Themes and Concepts

  • Unique Item Collection

  • Various Business Locations

  • Special Events and Challenges

  • Cat Breeding System

  • Customer Relationship Management

  • Upgrade and Expansion Options

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAT PARADISE

  • Different shop themes and concepts

  • Unique items and decorations

  • Special equipment for your cats

  • Various business upgrade options

name: Now I'm Home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Build your purr-fect business empire with 50+ unique cats, each with their own special talents. Collect rare breeds, create powerful combinations, and manage your growing feline empire through challenging scenarios. With 50+ distinctive cats, countless items, and endless strategic possibilities
